title: M-BTC
author: M-BTC
content: Hello fellow collectors,Two hours ago Bitcoin artist 'RYR' posted on Twitter that one of his artworks (DESERTED EAGLE  1/21) has been stolen while on display at Bitcoin 2023: https://twitter.com/ryrartist/status/1659470270988537856 CLICK HERE TO SEE A VIDEO OF THE ARTWORKI'm donating 1,000,000 sats for information that leads to the person who stole it/who is selling it. Please let me (or RYR) know if you come across this artwork for sale somewhere. Thanks!

comments.author: Suzuki Matt
comments.body: Wow thats so messed up. I would say it's unbelievable but it is Miami. Anyone that doesn't know. Miami is a horribly crime ridden city. Always use extra precautions when there. I feel so horrible for RYR. Hopefully this pos is caught. I will definitely be keeping a eye out while I'm there. But I am willing to bet that thing is long gone. Hopefully our community is small enough that they won't be able to sell it. Not much worse than a thief.

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: So sorry to hear that this has happened! I have added your plight to a thread started awhile bacl for any missing...stolen items that people might come across on the forum!  I wish you the best of luck and will keep my eyes peeled!!   https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1802957.0

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: I really wonder what the f was going on in their heads when stealing such a unique piece.Is there really an underground market for this? I doubt it. Just hope this item somehow finds its way back to RYR.
